wikipedia_page.main: Simon Robert Porter (9 August 1950 – 9 February 2017) was an English cricketer. Porter was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm off break. He was born in Cowley, Oxfordshire.

response: *Simon Porter (MP), member of parliament for Reading, and also mayor
*Simon Porter (gymnast), competed in Artistic gymnastics at the 2011 Canada Winter Games
*9 February – Simon Porter, 66, cricketer and cricket administrator (Oxfordshire).
*Simon Porter, 66, English cricket player and administrator (Oxfordshire).Obituary: Former Oxfordshire cricket stalwart dies
